game.title: The Quest for the Dragon's Eye
game.objective: Uncover the location of the Dragon's Eye and hand it over to Old Man Jenkins.
game.description: A challenging quest demands your skills. Help the quest giver recover this legendary artifact from the unknown adversaries in the mountains.

task.objective: Track down the enemy's hideout near the Mountain Pass.
task.description: The lair is believed to be hidden near a rocky path leading into the mountains.

task.objective: Conquer the enemy and recover the Dragon's Eye.
task.description: Once inside, defeat their leader to claim the artifact.

task.objective: Return the Dragon's Eye to Old Man Jenkins in the village center.
task.description: After retrieval, deliver it to complete your quest.
